hasMenuItem.name: Manchurian Veggie / Paneer Pizzatwist
hasMenuItem.description: This pizza highlights our signature Manchurian sauce, offering the choice of just veggies(cauliflower bites) or adding paneer. It features fresh diced mozzarella cheese, crisp red onions, bell peppers, spicy jalapenos, and a blend of fresh diced garlic, ginger, and green chilies. Topped with fresh-cut green onions, it delivers a burst of freshness and flavor.

hasMenuItem.name: Tandoori Veggie/ Paneer Pizzatwist
hasMenuItem.description: Prepared with our signature Tandoori sauce, this pizza offers the choice between just veggies or adding paneer. It's topped with fresh diced mozzarella cheese, tomatoes, fresh mushrooms, crisp red onions, and a blend of fresh diced garlic, ginger, and green chilies. Garnished with fresh cilantro for a delicious fusion of flavors.

review.reviewBody: This was my first time order from this place and the food was really good.
Badly cooked. Don order from this place.
